com.cube.storm.ui.lib.handler

Class LinkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.ui.lib.handler.LinkHandler

  • public class LinkHandler
extends Object
    Link handler class used when a link is triggered in a holder

      • isYoutubeVideo

        public boolean isYoutubeVideo(@Nullable
                              Uri uri)
        Checks if a uri is a youtube video uri
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to check
        Returns:
        True if the uri is a youtube video, false if not

      • isVideo

        public boolean isVideo(@Nullable
                       Uri uri)
        Checks if a uri is a video uri by comparing the file extension. The current allowed video extensions are mp4 and m4v
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to check
        Returns:
        True if the uri is a video, false if not
